tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Bust of Leo Tolstoy", 1950–60.
1950–60. Porcelain (bisque). The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-238.
